attribute.name: MP_HOSTFILE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the name of the hostfile that maps tasks to nodes. {MP_HOSTFILE}

validator.error-message: Host list file must be a readable file containing a list of host names

attribute.name: MP_WORLD_SIZES_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify a ':' separated list of MPI world sizes {MP_WORLD_SIZES}

attribute.name: MP_PROCS_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number of application tasks. (Default: 1) {MP_PROCS}

validator.error-message: Number of application tasks must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_NODES_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number of nodes to run application. {MP_NODES}

validator.error-message: Number of nodes must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_TASKS_PER_NODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number application tasks per node. {MP_TASKS_PER_NODE}

validator.error-message: Number of application tasks per node must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_STDINMODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify how stdin is handled. (default: all) {MP_STDINMODE}

validator.error-message: Input mode specification is incorrect

attribute.name: MP_STDOUTMODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify how stdout and stderr are handled. (Default: unordered) {MP_STDOUTMODE}

validator.error-message: Output mode specification is incorrect

attribute.name: MP_IOAGENT_CNT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number I/O agents. {MP_TASKS_PER_NODE}

validator.error-message: Number of I/O agents must be 'all' or numeric

attribute.name: MP_IOTASKLIST_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify a ':' separated list of I/O agent tasks {MP_IOTASKLIST}

attribute.name: MP_LABELIO_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Prefix stdout and stderr for each task with task number. {MP_LABELIO}

attribute.name: MP_PMDLOG_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Generate a PMD log for diagnostic purposes. (Default: no) {MP_PMDLOG}

attribute.name: MP_INFOLEVEL_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify PE diagnostic message level. (Default: 1) {MP_INFOLEVEL}

attribute.name: MP_STATISTICS_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Obtain communication statistics for user space jobs. {MP_STATISTICS}

attribute.name: MP_PMDLOG_DIR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify directory where PMD log is stored. (Default: /tmp) {MP_PMDLOG_DIR}

validator.error-message: PMD log directory must be a writable directory

attribute.name: MP_PRIORITY_LOG_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if co-scheduler log should be created (Default: no) {MP_PRIORITY_LOG}

attribute.name: MP_PRIORITY_LOG_DIR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify directory where co-scheduler log is stored. (Default: /tmp) {MP_PRIORITY_LOG_DIR}

validator.error-message: Co-scheduler log directory must be a writable directory

attribute.name: MP_PRIORITY_LOG_NAME_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify name of co-scheduler log (Default: pmadjpri.log) {MP_PRIORITY_LOG_NAME}

attribute.name: MP_PRINTENV_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Print MPI environment variables for all tasks (Default: no) {MP_PRINTENV_ATTR}

attribute.name: MP_COREDIR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify directory where core files are stored. {MP_COREDIR}

attribute.name: MP_COREFILE_FORMAT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify 'STDERR' to write core data to stderr, blank for standard core file or name of lightweight corefile {MP_COREFILE_FORMAT}

attribute.name: MP_PROFDIR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify directory where GMON files are stored. {MP_PROFDIR}

attribute.name: MP_EUIDEVELOP_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify level of MPI parameter checking. (Default: no) {MP_EUIDEVELOP}

attribute.name: MP_COREFILE_SIGTERM_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Select to create corefile if application gets SIGTERM {MP_COREFILE_SIGTERM}

attribute.name: MP_EUIDEVICE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify adapter to use for message passing {MP_EUIDEVICE}

attribute.name: MP_EUILIB_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Communication subsystem to be used (Default: ip) {MP_EUILIB}

attribute.name: MP_TASK_AFFINITY_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Attach application tasks to system rset for task affinity {MP_TASK_AFFINITY} )

validator.error-message: Task affinity election is invalid

attribute.name: MP_FIFO_ROUTE_MODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Routing mode to be used for FIFO operations (Default: hw_direct) {MP_FIFO_ROUTE_MODE_ADDR}

attribute.name: MP_RDMA_ROUTE_MODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Routing mode to be used for RDMA operations (Default: hw_direct) {MP_RDMA_ROUTE_MODE_ADDR}

attribute.name: MP_INSTANCES_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify number of user space windows or IP addresses to use (Default: 1) {MP_INSTANCES}

validator.error-message: Number of instances must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_ADAPTER_USE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify how node's adapter should be used {MP_ADAPTER_USE}

attribute.name: MP_CPU_USE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify how node's CPU should be used {MP_CPU_USE}

attribute.name: MP_BINDPROC_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Bind tasks to first logical CPU. Use for OpenMP Only {MP_BINDPROC}

attribute.name: MP_USE_MC_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specifies if hardware multicast feature is used (Default: no) {MP_USE_MC}

attribute.name: MP_MC_INET_BASE_ADDR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the base IPv4 multicast address (Default: 224.3.0.1) {MP_MC_INET_BASE_ADDR}

validator.error-message: Multicast base address must be a valid IPv$ IP address

attribute.name: MP_MC_INET_ADDR_LEN_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify size of multicase address range (Default: 16) {MP_MC_INET_ADDR_LEN}

validator.error-message: Size of muticast range must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_MC_INET_PORT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify port number to use for multicasting (Default: 2008) {MP_MC_INET_PORT}

validator.error-message: Multicast port number must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_CMDFILE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify script to load nodes in partition {MP_CMDFILE}

validator.error-message: Command file must be a readable file on remote system

attribute.name: MP_REMOTEDIR_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify script to echo name of current directory to be used on remote nodes {MP_REMOTEDIR}

validator.error-message: Remote directory script must be a readable file on remote system

attribute.name: MP_PGMMODEL_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify programming model (Default: spmd) {MP_PGMMODEL}

attribute.name: MP_RESD_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Select for POE to allocate nodes. De-select to use hostfile {MP_RESD}

attribute.name: MP_TIMEOUT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: "Specify POE connection timeout {MP_TIMEOUT}"

validator.error-message: POE Connection timeout must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_ACK_THRESH_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify packet acknowledgment threshold {MP_ACK_THRESH}

validator.error-message: Acknowledgement threshold must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_POLLING_INTERVAL_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify PE polling interval (Default: 400000) {MP_POLLING_INTERVAL}

validator.error-message: MPI polling interval must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_UDP_PACKET_SIZE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify UDP packet size {MP_UDP_PACKET_SIZE_ATTR}

validator.error-message: UDP packet size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_WAIT_MODE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify thread behavior when waiting for messages (Default: poll) {MP_WAIT_MODE}

attribute.name: MP_BULK_MIN_MSG_SIZE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify minimum message size for messages using bulk transfer (Default: 153600) {MP_BULK_MIN_MSG_SIZE}

validator.error-message: Minimum bulk message size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_RC_MAX_QP_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of QPairs (Default: 8156) {MP_RC_MAX_QP}

validator.error-message: Maximum number of QPairs must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_IMM_SEND_BUFFERS_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number of immediate send buffers (Default: 1) {MP_IMM_SEND_BUFFERS}

validator.error-message: Number of immediate send buffers must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_COLLECTIVE_GROUPS_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the number of CAU groups (Default: 0) {MP_COLLECTIVE_GROUPS}

validator.error-message: Number of CAU groups must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_CC_SCRATCH_BUF_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if fastest collective algorithm is used {MP_CC_SCRATCH_BUF}

attribute.name: MP_CSS_INTERRUPT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if arriving packets generate interrupts (Default: no) {MP_CSS_INTERRUPT}

attribute.name: MP_USE_BULK_XFER_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Use adapter bult data transfer mechanisms (Default: no) {MP_USE_BULK_XFER}

attribute.name: MP_RC_USE_LMC_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Use lid mask control (LMC) (Default: no) {MP_RC_USE_LMC}

attribute.name: MP_FORCED_INTERRUPTS_ENABLED_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Use forced interrupts for rondezvous message in RDMA transfer (Default: no) {MP_FORCED_INTERRUPTS_ENABLED}

attribute.name: MP_MSG_ENVELOPE_BUF_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify size of message envelope buffer (Default: 8388608) {MP_MSG_ENVELOPE_BUF}

validator.error-message: Envelope buffer size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_IO_BUFFER_SIZE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify size of MPI_IO buffer {MP_IO_BUFFER_SIZE}

validator.error-message: MPI_IO buffer size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_EAGER_LIMIT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify rendezvous protocol message size threshold (Default: 4096) {MP_EAGER_LIMIT}

validator.error-message: Eager limit must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_RETRANSMIT_INTERVAL_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify interval to check if retransmit required {MP_RETRANSMIT_INTERVAL}

validator.error-message: MPI retransmit interval must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_REXMIT_BUF_CNT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify number of retransmit buffers per task (Default: 128) {MP_REXMIT_BUF_CNT}

validator.error-message: Retransmit buffers must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_REXMIT_BUF_SIZE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify maximum LAPI buffer size (Default: 16352) {MP_REXMIT_BUF_SIZE}

validator.error-message: Retransmit buffer size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_PRIORITY_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify co-scheduler priority class name {MP_PRIORITY}

attribute.name: MP_SHARED_MEMORY_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if shared memory is used for communication (Default: yes) {MP_SHARED_MEMORY}

attribute.name: MP_SHMCC_EXCLUDE_LIST_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify list of MPI collectives excluded from using shared memory {MP_SHMCC_EXCLUDE_LIST}

attribute.name: SCI_DEBUG_FANOUT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify fanout value for SCI agent tree (Default: 32) {SCI_DEBUG_FANOUT}

validator.error-message: SCI_DEBUG_FANOUT: SCI fanout must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_SINGLE_THREAD_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if application has single thread with MPI calls (Default: no) {MP_SINGLE_THREAD}

attribute.name: MP_CLOCK_SOURCE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if high performance switch is clock source {MP_CLOCK_SOURCE}

attribute.name: MP_MSG_API_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify message passing API(s) used by application (Default:mpi) {MP_MSG_API}

attribute.name: MP_DEVTYPE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Select 'hfi' to use HFI device type, blank otherwise {MP_DEVTYPE}

attribute.name: MP_TLP_REQUIRED_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specifies if POE shuld check if application was compiled for large pages {MP_TLP_REQUIRED}

attribute.name: MP_EUILIBPATH_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify path to message passing and communication libraries (Default: /opt/ibmhpc/pe1100/ppe.poe/lib) {MP_EUILIBPATH}

validator.error-message: Library path must be a directory containing communication libraries

attribute.name: MP_SAVEHOSTFILE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify path to saved hostfile generated by partition manager {MP_SAVEHOSTFILE}

attribute.name: MP_IONODEFILE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the file listing nodes performing parallel I/O {MP_IONODEFILE}

validator.error-message: MPI I/O node list file must be a readable file

attribute.name: MP_PULSE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the interval at which PE checks remote nodes (Default: 600) {MP_PULSE}

validator.error-message: Pulse interval must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_THREAD_STACKSIZE_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify additional stack size for MPI service thread (Default: 0) {MP_THREAD_STACKSIZE}

validator.error-message: Thread stack size must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_TIMEOUT_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify timeout limit for connecting to remote nodes (Default: 150) {MP_TIMEOUT}

validator.error-message: Connection timeout must be numeric

attribute.name: MP_CONFIG_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the PE release level to use {MP_CONFIG}

attribute.name: MP_PMDSUFFIX_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify the suffix for the PMD service name {MP_PMD_SUFFIX}

attribute.name: MP_HINTS_FILTERED_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if MPI info objects reject hints (Default: no) {MP_HINTS_FILTERED}

attribute.name: MP_PRIORITY_NTP_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if PE co-scheduler disables NTP during adjustment period (Default: no) {MP_PRIORITY_NTP}

attribute.name: MP_COSCHEDULER_VERSION_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specifies if POE runqueue co-scheduler is used {MP_COSCHEDULER_VERSION}

attribute.name: MP_IO_ERRLOG_ATTR
attribute.tooltip: Specify if I/O error logging is enabled (Default: no) {MP_IO_ERRLOG}
